00033 namespace RDK2 { namespace Filesystem {

00035     void fsMakeParents(cstr /*path*/) throw(runtime_error) {
00036         #warning Implement fsMakeParents
00037     }
00038 
00039     string fsOnlyFilename(cstr path) throw(runtime_error) {
00040         string s((const char*)basename((char*)path.c_str()));
00041         return s;
00042     }
00043 
00044     void fsOpenOrException(ifstream&ifs, cstr filename) throw(runtime_error) {
00045         ifs.open(filename.c_str());
00046         if(!ifs)
00047             throw runtime_error(string("Could not open file ")+quote(filename)+" for reading.");
00048     }
00049 
00050     void fsOpenOrException(ofstream&ofs, cstr filename) throw(runtime_error) {
00051         ofs.open(filename.c_str());
00052         if(!ofs)
00053             throw runtime_error(string("Could not open file ")+quote(filename)+" for writing.");
00054     }
00055 
00056     string fsCat(cstr path1, cstr path2) {
00057         return fsRealpath(path1+"/"+path2);
00058     }
00059 
00060     string fsRealpath(cstr s) throw (runtime_error) {
00061         // the use of PATH_MAX is deprecated
00062         // please fix this
00063         // FIXME-LM
00064         char resolved_path[4096];
00065 
00066         if(NULL==realpath(s.c_str(), resolved_path)) {
00067             throw runtime_error(string("Could not get realpath for file ")+quote(s)
00068             +", reason = " + strerror(errno));
00069         } else return string(resolved_path);
00070     }
00071 
00072     double modificationTime(cstr file) {
00073         struct stat s;
00074         if(stat(file.c_str(),&s)) {
00075             throw runtime_error(string("Could not get modification time ")
00076             +"for file " + quote(file)+"; error: " + strerror(errno));
00077         }
00078 #ifdef LINUX
00079         return s.st_mtime;
00080 #endif
00081 
00082 #ifdef MACOSX
00083         return s.st_mtimespec.tv_sec;
00084 #endif
00085         
00086 #ifdef CYGWIN
00087         return s.st_mtime;
00088 #endif
00089     }
00090 
00091     bool fsNewerThan(cstr file1, cstr file2) throw(runtime_error) {
00092         return modificationTime(file1) > modificationTime(file2);
00093     }
00094 
00095     bool fsExists(cstr file) throw() {
00096         struct stat s;
00097         return 0 == stat(file.c_str(),&s);
00098     }
00099 
00100     string fsReadFile(cstr file) throw(runtime_error) {
00101         ifstream ifs; fsOpenOrException(ifs, file);
00102         ostringstream oss; // XXX non c'ï¿½ bisogno
00103         char c;
00104          while(ifs.get(c)) oss.put(c);
00105         return oss.str();
00106     }
00107 
00109     string fsDirname(cstr file) throw(runtime_error) {
00110         char * dir = dirname((char*) file.c_str());
00111         if(!dir)
00112             throw runtime_error(string("Could not get dirname for ")+file);
00113         return string(dir);
00114     }

00117 {
00118 #warning implement fsDirContent

00121     if (!dip) return false;
